name: Ball Run Tunnel
description:
Basic

Name: Ball Run Tunnel
Genre: Arcade
Platforms: Android
Similar games: Tunnel Rush
Engine: Unity
Monetization: Free-to-Play
Developer: PGD Studio
Composer: Run With Guitar

Description

★ Ball ★ Run ★ Tunnel ★
Challenge the hypnotic tunnel!
Roll, turn around, break through! Just do not fall into the abyss!
Go as far as you can and set your own record! Become the best!
Collect bonuses and coins, they will help you in your attempts!
Do not forget to improve your abilities!
What are you waiting for, go ahead! Run along the tunnel!

Features
  • An infinitely generated tunnel with increasing levels of complexity;
  • 2 types of bonuses: Rocket and Magnet;
  • Ability to improve the characteristics of bonuses;
  • Ability to change the color and pattern on the ball;
  • The ability to earn an achievement and compete with other players in the leaderboard.
